headline: Heard on the Street Friday Recap: Tech Fears Are Back
summary: Tech stocks led a rout. The S&P 500 fell 1.1%, pressured by sharp drops in some big technology names. The Nasdaq Composite lost 1.7%. The Dow Jones Industrial Average shed 245 points, or 0.5%. Broadcom's earnings were in focus.
